news.title: New paper!
news.text: 'Measuring what matters: Construct validity in large language model benchmarks.' will be presented at the NeurIPS 2025 Datasets and Benchmarks Track.

news.title: OxRML @ EMNLP 2025
news.text: We presented two papers at EMNLP 2025: 'How Does DPO Reduce Toxicity? A Mechanistic Neuron-Level Analysis' and 'LLMs Don't Know Their Own Decision Boundaries: The Unreliability of Self-Generated Counterfactual Explanations.'

news.title: OxRML @ NeurIPS 2024
news.text: We presented five papers at NeurIPS 2024 and its constituent workshops.

news.title: OxRML @ ICML 2024
news.text: Team members presented research and attended workshops at ICML 2024 in Vienna, Austria.

news.title: New paper!
news.text: Clinical knowledge in LLMs does not translate to human interactions.

news.title: New paper!
news.text: Evaluating the role of 'Constitutions' for learning from AI feedback.
